DracoonSort.summary: Super class for all specific sorts.

ToString.summary: Builds the string which contains the sort definition like "updatedAt:desc".

DracoonSortOrder.summary: Provides the functionality to set the sort as ascending or descending.
DracoonSortOrder.typeparam: Is the specific definition for a request like .

Ascending.summary: Sets the sort to ascending order.

Descending.summary: Sets the sort to descending order.
